import React, { Component } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import CartItem from "./CartItem"; export class Cart extends Component { showCartItem = (cart) => { let res = null; if (cart.length > 0) { res = cart.map((course, index) => { return }) } return res ; } render() { let { cart } = this.props; return (
{this.showCartItem(cart)}

); } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ cart: state.cart }); const mapDispatchToProps = {}; export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Cart);
